text:
Entertainment
Uncategorized Andrew Tateâ€™s online university hacked with emails & private chat logs leaked Eleni Thomas â˜ Published: 2024-11-22T05:34:08 Instagram: Andrew Tate/The Real World Andrew Tateâ€™s online University has been hacked, and hundreds of thousands of emails and private chat logs have been leaked online.
As first reported by The Daily Dot , content creator and online personality Andrew Tate was the subject of a major hack. His online University, The Real World, was infiltrated, and thousands of private records were leaked online.
While not a University in the conventional sense, The Real World, formerly known as Hustlerâ€™s University , offers its users â€œadvanced training and mentoringâ€ about earning money.
Article continues after ad The websiteâ€™s home page states that â€œMoney making is a skillâ€ and that it aims to â€œteach [users] how to master it.â€
While streaming an episode of â€œEmergency Meetingâ€ on Rumble , the hackers flooded the main chatroom of Tateâ€™s online university, spamming AI-generated images of Tate draped in the LGBTQ+ flag, emojis of the Transgender flag, a Feminist fist icon, and more.
Article continues after ad
Andrew Tateâ€™s online university was hacked
â€¢ Platformâ€™s security was described as 'hilariously insecure'
â€¢ ~325K email addresses as well as public & private chat logs were obtained
â€¢ Hackers spammed private chatrooms with trans flags and an AI-generated image of Andrew Tateâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/VNA6cLl6E4
â€” Culture Crave ğŸ¿ (@CultureCrave) November 22, 2024 The hackers provided a statement to the Daily Dot, claiming that after gaining access to Tateâ€™s online University, they could â€œupload emojis, delete attachments, crash everyoneâ€™s clients, and temporarily ban peopleâ€ from the platform.
Article continues after ad In addition, it was reported that over 794,000 usernames of the siteâ€™s current and former members were leaked, over 320,000 email addresses were obtained, and the contents of 395 private chat servers were also obtained.
These leaked private chat logs contain conversations in which users of Andrew Tateâ€™s online University were complaining about the â€œLGBTQ agenda.â€
One such leaked private message reading is as follows:
â€œLGBTQ agenda, the matrix. I live in a very good area with a very good home life, but I am sick of all this garbage happening here.â€
Related: Logan Paul criticized for leaking TommyInnit DMs as viral â€œbeefâ€ gets personal Article continues after ad A source close to the breach detailed to the Daily Dot that the motive for this violation was â€œhacktivism,â€ the same source claiming that the platformâ€™s security was â€œhilariously insecure.â€
Article continues after ad Andrew Tate has yet to address this new security breach as of this writing. However, weâ€™ll update this article if he does issue a statement.

Eleni Thomas is a Senior Writer on Dexerto's Australia team, specializing in Gaming and wider gamer culture. She is a journalism graduate, expertly covering TV & Movies, GTA, Pokemon, Nintendo games, Twitch streamers, and YouTubers. She is also passionate about covering Queer and female representation.
